channel.title: Strike Force Five
channel.description: Late night talk show hosts Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers and John Oliver are teaming up for a new podcast to support their striking writers and out of work staffs. Strike Force Five! welcomes you to a conversation between five rival colleagues for an inside look at late night television.
channel.itunes:summary: Late night talk show hosts Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers and John Oliver are teaming up for a new podcast to support their striking writers and out of work staffs. Strike Force Five! welcomes you to a conversation between five rival colleagues for an inside look at late night television.

item.title: Ep 12: The Strike Force Five Says Goodbye (with a Special Guest)
item.description: The Strike Force Five says goodbye with a very special guest. Thank you for listening and supporting our staffs. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 11: The Return of Strike Force Wives!
item.description: America’s favorite game show disaster is back! Part two of “Strike Force Wives!” hosted by the befuddling Jimmy Fallon. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 10: The Strike is Over But the Podcast Isn’t Yet
item.description: The WGA strike is over but we still have a few podcasts left! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 9: David Letterman Makes it Six
item.description: The greatest of them all, David Letterman joins “Strike Force Five!” All proceeds from this podcast go to supporting our staffs. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 8: The Talk Show Hosts Name Sneaky Great Talk Show Guests
item.description: Great unsung guests and much more on episode 8 of “Strike Force Five!” All proceeds go to support our out of work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 7: Jon Stewart Makes it Six
item.description: Our friend Jon Stewart joins “Strike Force Five” to support our out-of-work late night staffs. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 6: The Guys Answer Questions from Listeners
item.description: Finally, your questions are answered on the first mailbag episode of “Strike Force Five!” Listen now. All proceeds go to their out-of-work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 5: Strike Force Wives!
item.description: Episode five is about our wives. Jimmy Fallon hosts the WORST GAME SHOW EVER in our favorite episode so far. Listen now - all proceeds go to out-of-work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 4: Awards Show Screwups, Late Night Multiverse & Batman Wants to Murder Kimmel
item.description: Classic late night television, first on-air jokes, awards show mishaps and more on Episode 4 of “Strike Force Five” with Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers & John Oliver. All proceeds go to their out-of-work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 3: Stories We Missed, Vasectomies and Moby Dick
item.description: How have five showless hosts been keeping busy? What’s the news story they wish they hadn’t missed? What’s going on inside their pants? Find out on Episode 3 of “Strike Force Five” with Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers & John Oliver. All proceeds go to their out-of-work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 2: A Second Episode About First Episodes
item.description: What’s the second episode of “Strike Force Five” about? First episodes. Special thanks to Jon Hamm for lending his sultry voice. ALL proceeds go to support our out-of-work late night staffs during the strike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Ep 1: Five Late Night Hosts Talk at the Same Time for the First Time
item.description: Episode one of “Strike Force Five” hosted by Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers and John Oliver is here. All proceeds go to support their out of work staffs during the strike. Have a question? Write us here – questions@strikeforcefive.com. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Introducing 'Strike Force Five'
item.description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to watch a football team with five quarterbacks on the field at once? Introducing Strike Force Five!, hosted by Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, Seth Meyers and John Oliver. All proceeds go to support their out of work staffs. Listen now, it’s the right thing to do. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
